about_the_game:
In the depths of the mystical realm, a journey awaits you in Arcane Depths, a captivating 2D action roguelike dungeon crawler. Assume the role of a formidable sorcerer, delving into magical depths fighting against relentless enemies.

Master the Art of Spellcasting

As you progress, you'll uncover the art of spellcasting, honing your skills to become a true master of arcane power. Experiment with a vast array of spells, strategically combining them to unleash devastating combinations upon your foes.

Procedurally Generated Dungeons

Traverse ever-shifting environments, encountering a multitude of deadly enemies, clever traps, and hidden secrets. Your decisions will shape your fate, and the rewards you reap will strengthen you for the battles to come.


Conquer Powerful Bosses

In your quest for supremacy, face off against powerful bosses, each demanding unique tactics and unwavering determination to conquer. Defeating them will yield great treasures and unlock new possibilities, empowering you on your perilous journey.

A World Brimming with Magic

Immerse yourself in a world brimming with magic, brought to life through stunning visuals, atmospheric music, and immersive sound design. Discover a captivating narrative that unfolds as you descend deeper into the Arcane Depths, revealing the secrets and mysteries of this ancient realm.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2016
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200, AMD Athlon XE BE-2300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500 (Broadwell), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri)
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo SU9400, Apple M1
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500 (Broadwell), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri)
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Arcane Depths is a 2D action roguelike dungeon crawler. Become a powerful sorcerer and dive into dangerous depths filled with enemies and treasures. Combine a multitude of spells and relics to annihilate your foes. Procedurally generated dungeons, intense combat, and powerful bosses awaits!
